name: Scrambled Eggs
description:
What's more practical than making scrambled eggs?

You can do it anywhere! Anytime! Anyway!
Don't let the life obstacles ruin your scrambled eggs.
You can do it!

We have 1 rule: you can't eat with the eggshell.
Try to break it before throwing into the frying pan. I don't want any excuses, you'll find a smart way to break the egg, I trust you.

Any questions? No? Egg-cellent!
